title: Xayah feathers against Yasuo.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So in the gif above it shoves you how Yasuo blocked my feathers from Q and a auto attack so they droped infront of it and when i used my E to root him since he had gone past the wall the feathers got deleted by the same wall even when they were infront of it.

replies.body: It's because the wall stops the feathers directly on the wall, and the feathers have a hitbox slightly behind the feathers, so the hitbox hit the wall and disappeared. Also, the wall does move the entire time it's up

I see them behind the ground line.

It is possible that he used Wind Wall in the exact moment they had hit him and the wall then moved on.
Notice how his wall slowly moves forwards after being cast.
